title: Quinoa Beet Salad
steps: In a large bowl, toss beets and carrots in 1 t red wine vinegar and 2 t olive oil.
In a large baking tray, bake beets and carrots for 45 minutes. Stir half-way through cooking.
Combine vegetable broth and quinoa. Bring to a boil uncovered, then  cover and simmer until quinoa is cooked, about 20 minutes.
Make the dressing: combine Dijon mustard, remaining red wine vinegar and olive oil.
Combine cooked quinoa, chopped kale, and baked beets and carrots. Pour dressing over salad.
